Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Westin Harbour Castle, you'll be centrally located in Toronto, steps from Jack Layton Ferry Terminal and minutes from Air Canada Centre. This 4-star hotel is close to CN Tower and University of Toronto.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 977 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages and body treatments. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Toronto? This hotel has facilities measuring 69998 square feet (6503 square meters), including meeting rooms. Guests may use a ferry terminal shuttle for a surcharge, and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages and body treatments. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.
Make yourself at home in one of the 977 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

With a stay at Westin Harbour Castle, you'll be centrally located in Toronto, steps from Jack Layton Ferry Terminal and minutes from Air Canada Centre. This 4-star hotel is close to CN Tower and University of Toronto.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Jack Layton Ferry Terminal - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Air Canada Centre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Brookfield Place - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Hockey Hall of Fame - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Sony Centre for the Performing Arts - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Steam Whistle Brewing - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Harbourfront Centre - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Ripley's Aquarium of Canada - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
St. Lawrence Market - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Metro Toronto Convention Centre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
CN Tower - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Roy Thomson Hall - 1 km / 0.6 mi
CBC Museum - 1 km / 0.6 mi
The Cathedral Church of St James - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Toronto Symphony Orchestra - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Toronto, ON (YTZ-Billy Bishop Toronto City) - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.) - 19.5 km / 12.1 mi

The preferred airport for Westin Harbour Castle is Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Westin Harbour Castle are:
Toronto, ON (YTZ-Billy Bishop Toronto City Airport) - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.) - 19.5 km / 12.1 mi

The preferred airport for Westin Harbour Castle is Toronto, ON (YYZ-Pearson Intl.).

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
